unnormalised: Arre bhai, ape PAN card number Aadhaar serenj te joda akada? Last date do 31/03/2024, warna apeya ITR te problem hoyok aa, aar GSTIN o cancel hoyo dareyaa!
normalised: Arre bhai, am ḍok peṛẽj P-A-N card number Aadhaar sāw ḍok keḍā? Mućat tārīkh menākʼā tīs mars bar hejār bar gel morẽ, nate khan ām I-T-R re ṭhik nã̃y huyukʼā, ar G-S-T-I-N o baṭel hoyo dareyā!
